text: In an exclusive interview, “ Extra ’ s ” AJ Calloway spoke to former ` ` Real Housewives of New York'' cast member Jill Zarin, the first time she ’ s returned to her signature NY store, Zarin Fabrics, since the passing of her husband Bobby on January 13 from cancer. She talked to AJ about her life today and the status of her relationship with some of her former cast members. On returning to her store : “ It was very surreal coming into Zarin Fabrics today. It ’ s the first time I've been back since Bobby died. I didn't expect to be emotional when I walked in the door. He would have been 72 two weeks ago... it's surreal. But he's here. ” Does she
